scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:renderer" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && sleep 2 && electron dist/main/main.js"
scripts.dev:main: concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.main.json --watch" "tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json --watch" "nodemon --watch dist/main/preload.js --exec 'cp dist/main/preload.js dist/main/preload.cjs'"
